column1:
,TRUE,5,3,3,4,5 Bricksisko","2019-07-18T05:14:21.313Z","Very Impressed","

I am very impressed with this set. When I first saw the pictures, i knew I wanted to get it. I ended up purchasing it at my local Lego store and it did not disappoint. Here is a pro/con list to sum up my thoughts.
-Really nice play feature where you can lay eggs into the chest
-You get Alex instead of Steve to mix it up
-It would be unrealistic in the actual Minecraft game
-If this is your only Minecraft set, you won'
-The eggs feel a little bit too large compared to the chickens
Overall, This is a really great set. It was really hard for me to try to find some cons. That is just how good it is. I would recommend this set over any other small
column3: set released as of July 2019. Hopefully this helped you make a decision about if you should buy this set! Thanks for reading.

column1: The price is absolutely worth it and the building experience was awesome with the Chicken build. The playability is ok with the feature to drop eggs. The parts are good.
